subject: Pedal Pro X Ultra
description_text:
Hello Simsonn!

I’ve been looking into getting the Pro X Ultra’s but I have 2 questions before I pull the trigger.

1: Can they be inverted safely?

2: Which country are they shipped from? Im from Denmark so just curious about VAT

Mvh/Greetings

Daniel Schmidt

conversations.body_text: Hi Daniel Schmidt,    We have not officially released an inverted installation solution; however, I have noted that some customers have indeed installed them upside down. Additionally, we ship from Germany, so there will be no customs duties.

Hi again

So can i conclude that there's nothing holding me back for installing them
upside down? Will it break warranty installing them like that?
